description.p: Welcome to the Information Systems Technology Laboratory (ISTLab), established at the Department of Management Science and Technology of the Athens University of Economics and Business. Here we explore, research, create, formulate, and integrate engineering and management practices to increase the productivity of the information systems realisation process. To reach our goal we follow a number of interrelated paths:
ISTLab consists of four federated research groups:

ul.li: IRIS: Interdisciplinary Research on the Information Society, headed by Nancy Pouloudi
OIS: Organizational Information Systems, headed by Angeliki Poulymenakou
SENSE: Software Engineering and Security, headed by Diomidis Spinellis
WRC: Wireless Research Center, headed by George Giaglis
